Posts.Content: Apr 23, 2009 04:10PM doublejen wrote: I was diagnosed at 37 and I have a 10 year old daughter of my own.  My thoughts and prayers are with you as both a mother and a survivor.  I agree completely with the others about educating yourself. - Knowledge is Power!  Remember as you research that breast cancer is an individual disease and no two cases are identical.  This is probably obvious given her age, but keep it in mind as you read because the amount of information can be overwhelming.  Hopefully the cancer center you choose has patient navigators to help guide you through your treatment experience.  They can be like angels when facing cancer.     Although 10 years old is astoundingly young, you may want to check out youngsurvival.org for information and support and also planetcancer.org.
Posts.Title: HELP! 10 year old with bc cjsocal Mary-Lou
